title: North Korea blows up office used for talks with South
description: North Korea has blown up a joint liaison office used for talks between itself and South Korea, authorities in Seoul confirmed Tuesday, the latest sign that the relationship between the two longtime adversaries is rapidly deteriorating.

title: Pandemic changes America's definition of national security amid fears China is trying to exploit it
description: Defense officials are increasingly concerned China is using the coronavirus crisis to gain stakes in strategically important businesses as the pandemic leaves struggling companies urgently in need of capital.

title: Most officials at White House event did not wear a mask
description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta responds to seeing Trump administration officials going against the White House Coronavirus Task Force and CDC guidance by not wearing a mask during a Rose Garden event.

title: Stelter explains why Trump is 'clearly rattled' by Bolton's new book
description: Former national security adviser John Bolton is set to release a book that details his time inside the Trump White House. CNN's Brian Stelter reports on how the White House is determined to stop Bolton.

title: Pence tries to declare outbreak over as cases spike across US
'Distressing': Reverend reveals what evangelicals say privately about Trump
description: Reverend Rob Schenck, a former evangelical activist, discusses President Trump's photo-op after police forcibly moved protesters and what evangelicals are now saying about Trump.

title: CIA cyber weapons stolen in historic breach due to 'woefully lax security'
description: The largest theft of data in CIA history happened because a specialized unit within the agency was so focused on building cyber weapons that an employee took advantage of "woefully lax" security and gave secret hacking tools to WikiLeaks, according to an internal report released on Tuesday.

title: Black officer fired for intervening when white cop had suspect in chokehold
description: Officials in Buffalo, New York, want an investigation into the firing of a black police officer who intervened when a white colleague had a suspect in a chokehold.

title: 20 Indian soldiers dead after clash with China along disputed border
description: At least 20 Indian soldiers have died after a "violent face-off" with Chinese troops along the countries' de facto border in the Himalayas late Monday, the Indian army has said.

title: Kanye West files trademark for new Yeezy beauty line
description: Rapper, fashion designer and potential 2024 presidential candidate Kanye West has his sights on the beauty industry. On June 2, West filed a new trademark with the United States Patent and Trademark Office under the name of his luxury streetwear brand Yeezy, for a host of new products that include makeup and fragrances; skin, hair and nail care products; face and body glitter; baby wipes; and hair removal cream.

title: Trump defends police while signing muted executive order on reform
description: President Donald Trump takes his first concrete steps on Tuesday to address growing national outcry over police brutality when he signs an executive order creating a federal database of police officers with a history of using excessive force.

title: 75-year-old protester shoved by police has fractured skull and can't walk
description: Martin Gugino, the 75-year-old protester who was pushed by two Buffalo, New York, police officers earlier this month, has a fractured skull and is not able to walk, his lawyer said in a statement provided to CNN on Monday.

title: They came to Canada as essential workers. Hundreds were infected on the job
description: Quarantined and alone in a Canadian hotel room, Alvaro was pensive and anxious. He said he wasn't so worried about testing positive for Covid-19, but about the paycheck he couldn't afford to lose.

title: 'Ghostbusters' cast reunites
description: The cast of the 80's classic "Ghostbusters" reunited on Josh Gad's YouTube show and reminisced about unscripted moments and their late co-cast member, Harold Ramis.

title: Jennifer Garner explains taking her cat for a walk in a stroller
description: One of Jennifer Garner's kids is responsible for their cat riding in style.

title: 'Ground-breaking' discovery made for treating Covid-19 patients
description: The widely available steroid drug dexamethasone may be key in helping to treat the sickest Covid-19 patients who require ventilation or oxygen, according to researchers in the United Kingdom.

title: Airlines ban alcohol on planes in response to Covid-19
description: Alcohol sales may have boomed during lockdown, but our return to air travel will be an altogether more sobering experience.

title: Author of revealing new book about Melania Trump speaks out
description: Mary Jordan, the author of the new book "The Art of Her Deal" about first lady Melania Trump, speaks to CNN's Alisyn Camerota.

title: Trump isn't aging well
description: Donald Trump is not coping well.

title: Why Africa's predicted Covid-19 surge hasn't happened
description: On January 28, at around one in the morning, Dr. John Nkengasong's cellphone rang in Addis Ababa.

title: Spacecraft captures 'green glow' of Mars
description: Mars may be known as the red planet, but a European spacecraft found oxygen that is causing a green glow in the planet's atmosphere, according to a new study.

title: 'Brilliant and talented' 16-year-old climber dies following fall
description: French climber Luce Douady has died at the age of 16 after falling from a cliff on Sunday, the French Federation of Mountaineering and Climbing (FFME) has said.

title: Soccer star, 22, takes on Boris Johnson over feeding hungry kids -- and wins
description: Manchester United and England star Marcus Rashford has written to UK lawmakers urging them them to "put their rivalries aside" and make a U-turn, after Prime Minister Boris Johnson rejected the footballer's plea to extend the free school meal voucher scheme for low-income families.

title: What it's like to play in soccer's 'ghost games'
description: If he's always had a knack of expanding his frame to make his goal seem smaller than it really is, Bayern Munich goalkeeper Manuel Neuer is all too aware of how his world has shrunk over the last few months.

title: I stayed at a new hotel during the pandemic. Here's what it was like
description: In the best of circumstances, opening a hotel tends to be a stressful and money-draining endeavor for any owner, not to mention risky.

title: Glass bridge cracks after tourist baseball-slides on it
description: A tourist managed to crack the clear glass floor of the largest pedestrian suspension bridge in the United States, forcing the Gatlinburg, Tennessee, landmark to close Monday night for repairs.

title: Trump indicates he's not budging on reducing number of US troops in Germany
description: President Donald Trump indicated on Monday that he's not reconsidering a plan to withdraw thousands of US troops from Germany, despite some Republicans in Congress saying they don't support the move.

title: You can now pay thousands of dollars to talk to celebrities for 10 minutes
description: Some bored and cooped-up celebrities (we're using that term lightly) have apparently hit "Peak Quarantine" are now offering Zoom calls with fans for hundreds -- and even thousands -- of dollars.

title: CNN reporter explains how to know the truth about what's going on in North Korea
description: Clues can be the only way to work out what's really going on in North Korea. CNN's Will Ripley shares which ones to look out for.

title: The battle to become Europe's safest holiday destination
Diego, the tortoise who saved his entire species, finally retires to uninhabited island
description: Diego, a libidinous giant tortoise credited with saving his species, has finally retired to an uninhabited island off the coast of Ecuador after decades of service in a breeding program.

title: Why is Ted Cruz picking a fight with Hellboy?
description: "Listen Hellboy."

title: Buttigieg on LGBTQ ruling: The struggle is not over
description: Former Mayor Pete Buttigieg, the first gay candidate for president in the US, talks to CNN's Jim Sciutto about the historic Supreme Court ruling on LGBTQ rights.

title: What are antifa members really doing during protests?
description: Many anti-fascist activists hide their identity when fighting white supremacy. But a few are speaking out after police brutality protests across the nation.

title: The internet shows Vogue how diverse its covers could look
description: People around the world have been re-creating Vogue covers to promote diversity in fashion.

title: Asylum seekers transferred to small Irish town started testing positive for Covid-19
description: Misha was living in a hotel in a leafy suburb of Ireland's capital city under the country's controversial asylum seeker accommodation system when a letter arrived.

title: Late-night hosts mock Trump's walk down ramp at West Point
description: Late-night hosts mock Donald Trump's slow walk down a ramp at the US Military Academy at West Point.

title: This bridge is nicknamed the 'narrowest place on Earth'
description: The island of Eleuthera, home to the showstopping Glass Window Bridge, is among many Bahamian islands that were not hit by Hurricane Dorian.

title: NYPD officers hospitalized after drinking Shake Shack milkshakes tainted with bleach
description: Three New York City Police Department officers have been released from the hospital after getting sick when they drank milkshakes from Shake Shack Monday night.

title: A gang tried to kidnap one of China's richest people. It didn't end well for them
description: A home appliance billionaire and one of China's richest people was held hostage with his family for hours in a kidnapping attempt that was reportedly foiled when his son swam across a river to alert police, local media and authorities said.

title: Members of chief's SWAT team resigned after she took a knee. See her response
description: Hallandale Beach Police Chief Sonia Quiñones, who took a knee with protesters, responds to the 10 SWAT members who resigned from their unit, saying they felt unsafely restrained by politics.

title: Tesla says Model S is the first EV to get 400 miles on a single charge
description: Tesla says its Model S Long Range Plus is the first electric vehicle to achieve over 400 miles of EPA-rated range.

title: This Chinese tech giant is building a Monaco-sized 'city of the future'
description: Technology giant Tencent has unveiled plans for an almost entirely car-free "city of the future," equivalent in size to Monaco, in the Chinese metropolis of Shenzhen.

title: 'Ridiculous logic': Anderson Cooper reacts to Trump's remark
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper calls out President Trump over comments he made about coronavirus testing.

title: Videos from police, the store and witnesses help piece together Rayshard Brooks' last moments alive
Amy Grant shares pictures of her heart surgery scar and talks about her 'miraculous' recovery
description: Gospel singer-songwriter Amy Grant has shared photos of her battle scar following her "miraculous" recovery from unexpected open heart surgery.
